title: Sensing Hardware Engineer
summary: The Sensor team develops ground breaking sensors that are central to a variety of Apple platforms, like Audio, iPads, Macs, Accessories. You will play a key role in specifying, developing, characterizing and validating sensor systems used in these platforms. You should be familiar with product integration and manufacturing technologies used to implement sensors in consumer products. The ideal candidate would have experience with technologies such as capacitive touch sensors.
description: You will be encouraged to specify, build and validate capacitive sensors in new product applications. You must work multi-functionally with test, firmware, and system engineering teams as well as product operations teams to deliver: New sensor design and integration. Schematic design of PCBs and/or flexible assemblies. Failure mode analysis, root cause diagnosis and system-level problem solving. Hands on bench measurements of prototypes. Key performance indicators for sensor/system level test. Documentation of specifications, design, test and FA processes. Business travel to support product development (up to 10% travel required)
key_qualifications: Experience in architecture, design, characterization, and validation of sensing systems that includes theory of operation, signal processing, and design trade-offs. Fundamental knowledge and experience in math, physics, and electrical engineering. Experience with manufacturing technology relevant for sensor fabrication is a plus. Proficiency in MATLAB, SPICE, or similar simulation and modeling tools. Proficiency in Python or other scripting languages. Experience with high volume mass production is a plus
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
